title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, November 25, 2019
description: Featuring a poem by David Kirby, “You Found That Thing You Lost,” and the birthdays of Joe DiMaggio (1914) and P.D. Eastman (1909).
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
